entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 6:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
